Sentencas: A novel system based on the indirect oxy-combustion of coal in a liquid Sb anode solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) has been used to produce electricity for over 48 h. Pulverized anthracite was fed to the liquidantimony-anode of the fuel cell, and a peak power density of 47 mW cm(-2) was reached at 1023 K and 35 mW cm(-2) at 973 K.
Titulo: Oxy-combustion of coal in liquid-antimony-anode solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The fuel cell was prepared using a porous stainless-steel tube as a support for an LSM cathode.
Titulo: Oxy-combustion of coal in liquid-antimony-anode solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: antimony oxide (Sb2O3)/yittria stabilized zirconia (YSZ, Y(0.08)Z(0.92)O(1.96)) composite electrolyte (membrane), while liquid antimony acted as the anode.
Titulo: Oxy-combustion of coal in liquid-antimony-anode solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Liquid antimony/antimony oxide served as the intermediate medium for coal oxidation producing mainly carbon dioxide, which evolved as a separate gas stream.
Titulo: Oxy-combustion of coal in liquid-antimony-anode solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The fuel cell will facilitate carbon capture process, and simultaneously convert the chemical energy of coal directly to electricity.
Titulo: Oxy-combustion of coal in liquid-antimony-anode solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The experiment showed that while the fabricated electrolyte was porous, it became dense during the actual operation, preventing nitrogen leakage into the Sb/C side and producing reasonable open circuit voltage.
Titulo: Oxy-combustion of coal in liquid-antimony-anode solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Analysis of the experimental EIS data illustrates that the Ohmic resistance was the primary loss mechanism in the system.
Titulo: Oxy-combustion of coal in liquid-antimony-anode solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: It further suggests approaches to improve the design.
Titulo: Oxy-combustion of coal in liquid-antimony-anode solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Continuous operation of this coal fueled oxy-combustion/fuel cell system achieved an overall efficiency of 28.2% despite of its tiny scale.
Titulo: Oxy-combustion of coal in liquid-antimony-anode solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Simple technologies can be employed to scale up this system at relatively low cost of fabrication and materials.
Titulo: Oxy-combustion of coal in liquid-antimony-anode solid oxide fuel cell system
